com.espertech.esper.metrics.codahale_metrics.metrics.util

Class DeadlockHealthCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.metrics.codahale_metrics.metrics.core.HealthCheck
      • com.espertech.esper.metrics.codahale_metrics.metrics.util.DeadlockHealthCheck

  • public class DeadlockHealthCheck
extends HealthCheck
    A HealthCheck implementation which returns a list of deadlocked threads, if any.

        protected HealthCheck.Result check()

        Description copied from class: HealthCheck
        Perform a check of the application component.
        Specified by:
        check in class HealthCheck
        Returns:
        if the component is healthy, a healthy HealthCheck.Result; otherwise, an unhealthy HealthCheck.Result with a descriptive error message or exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is an unhandled error during the health check; this will result in a failed health check
